any additional information: Assay performed in two different trays with NADH and NADPH.
Initial specific azoreductase activity was 0.003 U/mg. A 3-step purification process achieved over 200-fold purification.
Kinetic parameters showed a Km of 11 μM for Methyl Red.
No azoreductase activity was observed for Direct Blue 15 and Tartrazine.
Used for growth and production of azoreductase.
